### Race: People Belonging to Communities of Color {-}

Descriptive text here.

#### Maps {-}

These maps show the share of the population that belongs to a community of color for each census tract in Seattle CCD.

##### Seattle CCD {-}
```{r vuln-poc-seaccd-map}

make_acs_map(long_sf = map_acs_data_sf,
             .geog = 'tract',
             .category = 'VULN',
             .topic = 'B03002',
             .pal = 'plasma',
             .legend_title = "SHARE OF<br>PEOPLE OF COLOR<hr>2011-2015") 
```

##### COO Communities {-}
```{r vuln-poc-comm-map, fig.height=3, fig.width=2,  fig.show='hold', dpi=150}

# Tracts in COO communities
make_acs_map(long_sf = map_acs_data_sf,
             .comms_only = TRUE,
             .geog = 'tract',
             .category = 'VULN',
             .topic = 'B03002',
             .pal = 'plasma',
             .legend_title = "") %>% 
        miscgis::styleWidget(style = paste0("float: left;","margin:1px;","text-transform:uppercase;text-shadow:-1px 0 #FFFFFF,0 1px #FFFFFF,1px 0 #FFFFFF,0 -1px #FFFFFF"))


# Aggregated tracts for each COO community
make_acs_map(long_sf = map_acs_data_sf,
             .geog = 'community',
             .category = 'VULN',
             .topic = 'B03002',
             .pal = 'plasma',
             .legend_title = "") %>% 
        miscgis::styleWidget(style = paste0("float: none;","margin:1px;","text-transform:uppercase;text-shadow:-1px 0 #FFFFFF,0 1px #FFFFFF,1px 0 #FFFFFF,0 -1px #FFFFFF"))


```
